participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves to express herself through art.
participant_1.background: I cherish my sketch book more than anything. I am also a full-time student studying radiology at a local college. I work in commercials. Cher from Clueless is my idea of perfection. I am of average weight.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Caring and strong-willed, devoted to family and passionate about her beliefs.
participant_2.background: I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired. I have red hair. I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas. I am passionate about fighting for what is right, even if it means putting my neck on the line. I love to grow sunflowers.

content.text: It's going pretty well so far! I just got back from visiting the zoo with my son and he had a blast.
That's awesome! Koalas are my favorite animal! Are you a fan of them too?
I love koalas! They're so cute and cuddly. I would love to have one as a pet, but I don't think they're legal to have in the United States.
Yeah, I think they're endangered so it's illegal to have them as pets. But it would be so cool to have one!
Me too! They're just so peaceful and cute.
I love your red hair! It's so vibrant.
Thank you! I love it too. It's naturally this color.
I'm jealous! I wish my hair was red.
You should dye it! It would look great on you.
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I could pull it off.
I think you could! You have the perfect skin tone for it.
Thanks for the encouragement! Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I would love to see it!
I'll let you know if I do
